job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
From simplified, flat-rate payment technology to a full line of innovative business tools, there are so many ways to make a difference with Stax. With a team of talented and inspiring people who are as diverse as the solutions we offer, Stax is a home for innovators, collaborators, and mission drivers to come together and make a meaningful impact on the businesses we serve.
Since 2014, Stax has been shaping the future for thousands of businesses with solutions and technology that supports their journey to growth. It is our belief that every business deserves the ability to focus on what matters most to them.
As a familial and highly spirited place to work, the Stax team makes every moment memorable - for our team, our customers, our partners, and our community. From an imaginative drive to endless curiosity and the courage to do things differently, at Stax we make things happen together and are driven by our core values!
We are united by the desire to give and a deep understanding of what truly matters in life. Reliability and trust support our capacity to do what we love with a ready smile.
We hone in on what matters to businesses. We cheer and challenge, pushing each other to take one more step. Then another. We don’t stop. We just roll up our sleeves and grind.
We communicate with vulnerability and an open heart. We inspire each other as we work towards a common purpose and goal. We spark joy and happiness across our team members and our customers
We’re proud to be recognized for our excellence in technology, work environment, and entrepreneurial spirit, with such honors as Best Fintech to Work For from PaymentSource; Coolest Office Space from Orlando Business Journal; and one of Entrepreneur Magazine’s Top Company Cultures. Not to mention countless acknowledgements in technology, innovation, and leadership from publications across the industry!
As the Software Engineer/Full Stack Engineer, you will be responsible for leading a variety of team members involved in several products at once for various platforms and services. This is a technical leadership role responsible for assisting at any technical capacity within the team to unblock and enable engineers and QA personnel. This person works to set standards and procedures with the team. This experienced engineer should be a great culture fit who is passionate about the team members’ success and the technology behind each product. Openness and vulnerability is a must-have.
We strongly believe in the value of having a diverse team and actively work to maintain an inclusive environment.
Stax is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, genetic information, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.
